title: Build a LEGO Macintosh Classic with e-paper display
text: An awesome, detailed community project of a wi-Fi enabled LEGO Macintosh Classic running Docker on a Raspberry Pi Zero with an eâ€‘paper display

title: Join the Seattle Workshop and Hackathon
text: Build an IoT project from start to finish with the resin.io team for a day-long workshop and hackathon at our Seattle office. We'll provide everybody with a starter kit that's your to keep to continue hacking at home!

title: Add cellular connectivity to your fleet with resinOS 2.0, 3G dongles, and SORACOM SIM cards
text: A detailed example to set up a Raspberry Pi with 3G connectivity, including sample code and configuration.

title: Use the resin SDK to manage your fleet - v6 just released!
text: OS metadata, browser support, custom locations, and API changes.

title: Preload applications and pre-provision devices in your fleet
text: This tutorial will walk you through the steps required to provision a large fleet of devices, preload the latest version of your application container, and associate specific resin.io devices with the SD cards you've prepared.

title: Come Work with Us!
text: We are actively recruiting for a Solution Architect, DevOps engineer, and Front-end Developer roles!
